{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
* {{ltt|cpp/language/return}} statement: as the declaration of the statement

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cstdlib&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

[[nodiscard]] constexpr auto clamp(int value, int min, int max) noexcept
{
    if (value &lt;= min)
        return min;
    else if (max &lt;= value)
        return max;

    return value;
    // won't be executed past 'return' statement

    std::exit(value);
}

int main() noexcept
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; clamp(1, 2, 4);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; clamp(3, 2, 4);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; clamp(5, 2, 4);
    
    return 0; // the value '0' that in main() indicates a success
}
|output=
234
}}
